hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -x -e
GITSERVER=10.20.30.20 MANUSCRIPT=imx-4.9.88-2.0.0_ga.xml
chmod 0600 ~/.ssh/id_rsa ssh-keyscan ${GITSERVER} >> ~/.ssh/known_hosts
# initialize technexion github yocto repository echo "===== Repo init yocto from TechNexion github =====" #${HOME}/bin/repo init -u https://github.com/TechNexion/edm-yocto-bsp.git -b rocko_4.9.y_GA -m $MANUSCRIPT ${HOME}/bin/repo init -u ssh://rdsw@${GITSERVER}/volume1/internal_git/edm/edm-yocto-bsp.git -b rocko_4.9.y_GA -m $MANUSCRIPT echo "===== Repo sync yocto from TechNexion github =====" rm -fR sources/meta-edm-bsp-release ${HOME}/bin/repo sync --force-sync
# Update EULA Agreement Acceptance Config and Create the setup-envronment scripts echo "===== Update EULA Agreement Acceptance Config and Create the setup-envronment scripts =====" sed -i ':a;N;$!ba;s/EULA_ACCEPTED=\n/echo "ACCEPT_FSL_EULA = \\"1\\"" >> conf\/local.conf\n/' sources/base/setup-environment

#!/bin/bash -x -e
cat > site.conf <<EOF # u-boot-edm.bb #SRCSERVER_pn-u-boot-edm = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/edm/uboot-imx-edm.git" #SRCBRANCH_pn-u-boot-edm = "tn-imx_v2018.03_4.14.98_2.0.0_ga-wip" #SRCOPTIONS_pn-u-boot-edm = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" #SRCREV_pn-u-boot-edm = "\${AUTOREV}" #SRC_URI_pn-u-boot-edm = "\${SRCSERVER};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}"
# u-boot-script.bb #SRCSERVER_pn-u-boot-script = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/edm/uboot-imx-edm.git" #SRCOPTIONS_pn-u-boot-script = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw"
# linux-firmware-brcm-tn.bb SRCSERVER_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/edm/brcm_firmware.git" SRCBRANCH_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = "master" SRCOPTIONS_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" SRCREV_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = "\${AUTOREV}" SRC_URI_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = "\${SRCSERVER};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}" S_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = "\${WORKDIR}/git"
# linux-firmware-qca-tn.bb SRCSERVER_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/edm/qca_firmware.git" SRCBRANCH_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = "caf-wlan/CNSS.LEA.NRT_3.0" SRCOPTIONS_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" SRCREV_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = "\${AUTOREV}" SRC_URI_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = "\${SRCSERVER};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}" S_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = "\${WORKDIR}/git"
# linux-tn-imx.bb #SRCSERVER_pn-linux-tn-imx = "git://10.20.30.20:/volume1/internal_git/edm/tn-kernel.git" #SRCBRANCH_pn-linux-tn-imx = "tn-imx_4.14.98_2.0.0_ga-wip" #SRCOPTIONS_pn-linux-tn-imx = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" #SRCREV_pn-linux-tn-imx = "c50aa9ea7ed19d1509921c00aeb4150c6cacb774" #SRC_URI_pn-linux-tn-imx = "\${SRCSERVER};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}"
EOF

#!/bin/bash -x -e
DLDIR=/home/jenkins/workspace/src/yocto2.4/download SSTATEDIR=/home/jenkins/workspace/src/yocto2.4/sstat
SOMs=("pico-imx6") # "edm-imx6" "pico-imx7" "tek3-imx6ul" "tep1-imx6ul" "edm-imx7" "pico-imx6ul" "tek-imx6" "tep1-imx7" "pico-imx8m") # "pico-imx8m" DISTROs=("x11") # "x11" "fb" "wayland" TGTIMGTYPEs=("fsl-image-qt5-validation-imx") # "core-image-base" "core-image-minimal" "core-image-sato" "fsl-image-machine-test" "fsl-image-validation-imx"
#WIFI_FIRMWARE=y WIFI_MODULE=brcm DISTRO=fsl-imx-fb MACHINE=pico-imx6 BASEBOARD=nymph source edm-setup-release.sh -b build-pico-imx6
# setup environment variables for building # BASEBOARDs=("pi" "nymph" "dwarf" "hobbit") # DISPLAYs=("lvds7" "hdmi720p" "hdmi1080p" "lcd" "lvds7_hdmi720p") # WLANs=("qca" "brcm" "ath-pci") setup_env_vars () { case $1 in pico-imx8m) board="pi" disp="mipi5" wlan="qca" ;; pico-imx6) board="nymph" disp="lvds7" wlan="brcm" ;; pico-imx7) board="pi" disp="lcd" wlan="qca" ;; pico-imx6ul) board="pi" disp="lcd" wlan="qca" ;; edm-imx6) board="fairy" disp="lvds7" wlan="qca" ;; edm-imx7) board="gnome" wlan="qca" ;; tep1-imx7) wlan="ath-pci" ;; tep1-imx6ul) ;; tek-imx6) disp="lvds10" wlan="ath-pci" ;; tek3-imx6ul) ;; *) ;; esac }
# Loop each som distro image_type and configs for som in ${SOMs[*]}; do for distro in ${DISTROs[*]}; do
# go to workspace for next build cd ${WORKSPACE}
# Set up the build environment variables setup_env_vars $som
# setup yocto build environment MACHINE=$som DISTRO=fsl-imx-$distro WIFI_FIRMWARE=y WIFI_MODULE=$wlan DISPLAY=$disp BASEBOARD=$board source edm-setup-release.sh -b build-$som
# get current build dir and check if local.conf exists BUILD_DIR=. if [ ! -e $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf ]; then echo -e "\n ERROR - No build directory is set yet. Run the 'setup-environment' script before running this script to create " $BUILD_DIR echo -e "\n" return 1 else # set the download directory [ -d ${DLDIR} ] || mkdir -p ${DLDIR} [ -d ${SSTATEDIR} ] || mkdir -p ${SSTATEDIR} # setup conf/local.conf echo "BB_NUMBER_THREADS ?= \"12\"" >> $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf if grep "^DL_DIR.*" $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf > /dev/null ; then sed -e 's|^DL_DIR.*|DL_DIR = "'$DLDIR'"|g' -i $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf else echo "DL_DIR = \"$DLDIR\"" >> $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf fi if grep "^SSTATE_DIR.*" $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf > /dev/null ; then sed -e 's|^SSTATE_DIR.*|SSTATE_DIR = "'$SSTATEDIR'"|g' -i $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf else echo "SSTATE_DIR = \"$SSTATEDIR\"" >> $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf fi cat $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf cat $BUILD_DIR/conf/bblayers.conf fi
cp $WORKSPACE/site.conf $BUILD_DIR/conf/site.conf cat $BUILD_DIR/conf/site.conf cat $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf cat $BUILD_DIR/conf/bblayers.conf export
bitbake u-boot-edm -c cleanall bitbake linux-tn-imx -c cleanall for target in ${TGTIMGTYPEs[*]}; do # building the yocto with preset config params echo "===== Building SOM:$som DISTRO:fsl-imx-$distro TARGET:$target =====" bitbake $target -c cleanall # Compile using bitbake bitbake $target done done done
